price: Ntibazigera boroherezwa (ibihano by’umuriro), kandi bazawubamo bihebye.
arabic: لَا يُفَتَّرُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَهُمۡ فِيهِ مُبۡلِسُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: lā yufattaru ʿanhum wahum fīhi mub'lisūna
